rows.label: qst630304_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes. Is very effective potion Tora
read about in book as littlepon!
Definitely make people like each other!

rows.label: qst630304_msg0003
rows.name: Is safe for Hana to drink?

rows.label: qst630304_msg0009
rows.name:
This feeling... Tora feel stronger
trust than ever coming from Hana!

rows.label: qst630304_msg0010
rows.name:
Masterpon... Hana feel it
too! Potion is success!

rows.label: qst630304_msg0011
rows.name:
Is actually quite strange feeling
to trust Masterpon this much. Usually
Masterpon seem more sketchy.

rows.label: qst630304_msg0012
rows.name: That is power of Love Source!
